title: Female softball coach lures teen girls to MURDER!
itunes:title: Female softball coach lures teen girls to MURDER!
description:
A body is found along a dirt road. Shea Briar, 31, a former dog handler for the Navy, is found shot in the back. Who killed the new father?


Joining Nancy Grace today;

  • Ken Belkin – NY Criminal Defense Attorney 
  • Caryn Stark – NYC Psychologist, www.carynstark.com 
  • Chris Byers - former Police Chief Johns Creek Georgia, 25 years as Police Officer, now Private Investigator and Polygraph Examiner, www.chrisbyersinvestigationsandpolygraph.com 
  • Dr. Kendall Crowns – Deputy Medical Examiner Travis County, Texas (Austin)
  • Ray Caputo - Lead News Anchor for Orlando's Morning News, 96.5 WDBO

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
